# Task (Optional): Reverse-name Website


Task: Create a website that takes a name as an input and reverses that input.

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<body>
    <h1>Name reverser</h1>

    Please enter your name:
    <input id="myname" type="text">
    <button onclick="reverse_it();">Calculate!</button>

    <script>
        var myage;
        function reverse_it() {
            myname = document.getElementById("myname").value
            var myname_reverse = myname.split("").reverse().join("")
            alert(myname_reverse)
        }
    </script>
</body>

</html>
```
